data.title: Island Waterpark at Showboat
data.meta_description: Experience some fun under the sun at Island Waterpark, an exciting waterpark located at the Showboat Hotel offering the perfect experience for families.
data.text:
Experience Adventure This Summer!

Enjoy non-stop splashes & endless fun for the whole family. Check out our opening hours this month and book your advance tickets to ensure you don't miss out on the fun filled action at Island Waterpark.

Phone: 609-964-7663

Paradise Island is exclusively open to ages 21 and above. Experience tropical bliss as our doors gracefully swing open during warm months to let in the natural breeze and securely seal during colder months to keep out the chill, ensuring comfort year-round. Our cabana rentals offer the perfect setting for unforgettable celebrations, complete with screens to enhance the party atmosphere. Enjoy drinks poolside and savor the moment in this tropical oasis. For sports enthusiasts, our bar boasts over four screens, ensuring you never miss a beat. Welcome to Paradise Island, where adults can bask in the endless escape of tropical paradise.

The Peach at The Beach

Presented by Live Nation!

Get ready for an electrifying experience at The Peach at the Beach presented by Live Nation, happening at Island Waterpark right on the Atlantic City Boardwalk! Join us for a sun-soaked celebration featuring live musical performances by Joe Russo's Almost Dead and an incredible lineup of artists. Dive into summer Island Waterpark style!

Lucky Snake Arcade

The World's Largest Arcade!

Dive into double the fun at Lucky Snake Arcade, our lively neighbor at Island Waterpark in Atlantic City! Amp up your adventure by loading arcade credits onto your Island Waterpark wristband â€“ it's a one-stop ticket to water park thrills and indoor arcade excitement! Experience wet slides, retro games, and endless opportunities for adult, family, and kid fun.
